snippet: Russell Maliphant’s newest and most ambitious dance, “The Rodin Project,” is inspired by Rodin’s interest in naturalistic movement and how it relates to popping, locking and breaking.
abstract: Choreographer Russell Maliphant expresses his passion for Auguste Rodin sculpture in his newest and possibly most ambitious dance The Rodin Project at the Joyce Theater.
lead_paragraph: Russell Maliphant’s newest and most ambitious dance, “The Rodin Project,” is inspired by Rodin’s interest in naturalistic movement and how it relates to popping, locking and breaking.

headline.seo: Russell Maliphant Brings ‘The Rodin Project’ to the Joyce
headline.main: Moving the Body: Rodin Meets Hip-Hop
headline.print_headline: Moving the Body: Rodin Meets Hip-Hop
